title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:00 <mflorea> has quit  
00:05 <abusenius> has quit  
00:38 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
01:57 <DrLou> has quit  
03:14 <lucaa> has quit  
05:10 <[1]jer> has joined #xwiki  
05:14 <[1]jer> has quit  
07:36 <CIA-102> Sergiu Dumitriu feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* r5942426 / (4 files in 2 dirs): [release] Updated translations - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/5942426a470bcf9ae5ababb753fcd57e0f0b1af7  
07:38 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:40 <@sdumitriu> mflorea: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-webstandards/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-webstandards/559/testReport/org.xwiki.test.webstandards/CustomDutchWebGuidelinesValidationTest/Validating\_Dutch\_Web\_Guidelines\_validity\_for\_\_space\_AppWithinMinutes\_u002C\_page\_ClassEditSheet\_executed\_with\_credentials\_Admin\_admin/  
07:43 <+mflorea> sdumitriu: I'll fix it. so no inline styles.. I'll have to use img instead of background-image  
07:43 <@cjdelisle> I just got the trunk and I seem to be having trouble with the js minifier  
07:44 <@cjdelisle> only shows up with tomcat though  
07:45 <@sdumitriu> The yui minifier is really bad  
07:45 <tekzilla> has quit  
07:45 <@sdumitriu> It's very fragile  
07:45 <@sdumitriu> It forbids any other use of rhino  
07:47 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
07:47 <@cjdelisle> maybe jar hell issues, it's just minifying the js into something non-executable  
08:32 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:32 <vmassol> mflorea: good morning, when you get some time would be good to add screenshots of the new class editor on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise33M1 (and explain how to try it out maybe since sergiu asked for feedback)?  
08:35 <vmassol> sburjan`: we need the updated list of supported browsers on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise33M1 too :)  
08:35 <vmassol> bfn, I'm off to a tennis match (I'm on holidays today :) )  
08:44 <+sburjan`> have fun :)  
08:47 <[1]jer> has joined #xwiki  
09:26 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:42 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* rfb4812d / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes/src/main/resources/AppWithinMinutes/ClassEditSheet.xml :  
09:42 <CIA-102> AppWithinMinutes/ClassEditor  
09:42 <CIA-102> \* Use image tag to display field icon instead of background-image set through inline style, in order to pass web standards validation tests.  
09:42 <CIA-102> \* Don't generate an empty line inside the field canvas when the class is empty. - http://git.io/qfE22g  
09:43 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r31e6458 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes/src/main/resources/AppWithinMinutes/ClassEditSheet.xml :  
09:43 <CIA-102> AppWithinMinutes/ClassEditor  
09:43 <CIA-102> \* Use image tag to display field icon instead of background-image set through inline style, in order to pass web standards validation tests.  
09:43 <CIA-102> \* Don't generate an empty line inside the field canvas when the class is empty.  
09:43 <CIA-102> (cherry picked from commit fb4812d1e95249c083f8a09051581a6b5ff840fd) - http://git.io/LZgamw

09:43 <CIA-102> AppWithinMinutes/ClassEditor  
09:43 <CIA-102> \* Use image tag to display field icon instead of background-image set through inline style, in order to pass web standards validation tests.  
09:43 <CIA-102> \* Don't generate an empty line inside the field canvas when the class is empty.  
09:43 <CIA-102> (cherry picked from commit fb4812d1e95249c083f8a09051581a6b5ff840fd) - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/31e64581563b568a56372319c0a8fb813e72e53a

13:17 <mflorea> has quit  
14:27 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:49 <+sburjan> vmassol: around ?  
14:49 <vmassol> sburjan: a bit  
14:50 <+sburjan> just wanted to tell you I am a little bit stuck at the jql part. but we'll discuss it tomorrow  
14:50 <@sdumitriu> vmassol, evalica: The download pages for XE and XEM have broken links, since the artifact names for the XARs have changed  
14:50 <@sdumitriu> We can't use the same variables for 3.2 and 3.3  
14:50 <vmassol> sburjan: if you want, send me the code you have and I'll have a look when I can  
14:51 <vmassol> sdumitriu: I don't know how the new download page is done  
14:52 <@sdumitriu> Is tmortagne away?  
14:52 <vmassol> we have quite a lot of broken links to fix too: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Admin/ExternalLinkStatus#|t=links&p=1&l=15&code=!200  
14:53 <vmassol> sdumitriu: today is bank holiday in France. Nobody is working  
14:53 <@sdumitriu> Ah, so I should be free as well  
14:53 <vmassol> you're not in France AFAIK ;)  
14:53 <vmassol> unless you're aligned to the French holidays and not the Canadian ones  
14:53 <@sdumitriu> I pay my taxes in Franc  
14:53 <@sdumitriu> e  
14:53 <vmassol> that's completely different  
14:54 <@sdumitriu> Don't worry, I won't go anywhere  
14:54 <vmassol> I mean it's a real choice  
14:54 <vmassol> companies have different options  
14:54 <vmassol> but usually it's easier to align one the country's holidays  
14:55 <vmassol> s/one/on/  
14:55 <vmassol> be lucky nobody from France is going to bother you today  :)  
15:08 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
16:27 <+sburjan> vmassol: I think I'm done with the Macro  
16:28 <+sburjan> I only have to clean it up a little bit  
16:28 <+sburjan> wanna see a sample ?  
16:49 <vmassol> sburjan: great, yep sure

16:50 <+sburjan> vmassol: giving you the link on private
